verbs.description: [ARG0: attorney] [V: appointed] [ARG2: for man charged in his parents killings] the bodies of a college professor and her husband have been recovered from a river in central illinois and their 21-year - old son who said he was sick of his parents according to authorities and stabbed them to death has been charged with first - degree murder the bodies of susan brill de ramirez and antonio ramirez barron both 63 were found tuesday in the spoon river near annawan resting against the riverbank peoria county coroner jamie harwood said jose ramirez was arrested and charged on monday after confessing to killing his parents peoria county sheriff brian asbell said ramirez has been appointed a public defender and is being held on a 3 million bond judge sean donahue scheduled h brill de ramirez killings matthew roberts peoria county peoria peoria county illinois attorney dave kenny susan brill de ramirez sheriff brian asbell antonio ramirez barron peoria illinois
